name: Hapalochlaena
description:
Hapalochlaena is a game about using a radio for explore a planet

Is anybody there?

Explore a devastated planet and search the crystals: the most valuable resource in the galaxy.

Be careful with the energy or u will die.

Use the ancient radio and search in the band frequencies for clues.

----------
AWSD: move
Mouse: use the radio
E: Use / Go back to the spaceship
----------

@MiguelFizbam - Design, Code (5 World Wars in Europa Universalis)
